mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule(num, userId, subject, categoryNum, color, sday, eday, stime, etime, repeat, repeat_cycle, memo, reg_date) VALUES(schedule_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{categoryNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{color}, #{sday}, #{eday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repeat}, #{repeat_cycle}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT num, subject, sday, eday, stime, etime, s.categoryNum, category, color, repeat, repeat_cycle, memo, reg_date FROM schedule s LEFT OUTER JOIN scheduleCategory sc ON s.categoryNum = sc.categoryNum WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET subject=#{subject}, categoryNum=#{categoryNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, color=#{color}, sday=#{sday}, eday=#{eday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stime=#{stime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etime=#{etime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repeat=#{repeat}, repeat_cycle=#{repeat_cycle}, memo=#{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE num=#{num} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM schedule WHERE num=#{num} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scheduleCategory(categoryNum, category, userId) VALUES(scheduleCategory_seq.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT categoryNum, category FROM scheduleCategory WHERE userId=#{userId} ORDER BY categoryNum
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM scheduleCategory WHERE categoryNum=#{categoryNum} AND userId=#{userId}
